alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:36AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Onslow County through 215 AM EDT... At 136 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Catherine Lake, or 7 miles west of New River Station, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, North Topsail Beach, New River Station, Half Moon, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, Camp Lejeune Center, Swansboro, Hubert, Folkstone, Kellum, Midway Park, Verona, Catherine Lake, Dixon, Onslow Beach, Albert J Ellis Airport, Richlands South, Sneads Ferry and Sea View Pier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
